definition: place/location/(after a noun) place where it is located
actually/place/classifier for houses, small buildings, institutions etc/that which/particle introducing a relative clause or passive/CL:個|个[ge4]
(located) at/(to be) in/to exist/in the middle of doing sth/(indicating an action in progress)
justice is to be found everywhere (idiom)

sentences.english: Do you know what his whereabouts are?
sentences.chinese: 你知道他現在的所在之處是什麼？

sentences.english: This sheeting has excellent entrance angularity, which is typical of encapsulated lens glass bead sheeting.
sentences.chinese: 具有更優秀的入射角，這也正是玻璃微珠的優勢所在。

sentences.english: That is the entire stalker problem right there.
sentences.chinese: 這纔是整個跟蹤狂問題的癥結所在。

sentences.english: But they disagree over the source of their disagreement.
sentences.chinese: 然兩國爭執的源由是雙方的嚴重利益分歧所在。

sentences.english: Each plug-in has access to information about a personâ ™s current location whereabouts. The location information includes
sentences.chinese: 各插件都可訪問關於某人當前位置所在的信息。

sentences.english: Is no substitute for showing off the core of her unique style.
sentences.chinese: 是否展露了無可取代的獨特風格纔是核心所在。

sentences.english: Anchor rope distribution is the key point in prestressed floodgate room design.
sentences.chinese: 錨索佈置是預應力閘室設計的關鍵所在。

sentences.english: Around the 4th century AD, the site of the Oita city was once called "Bungo".
sentences.chinese: 大約在公元4世紀，大分市所在地域便被稱爲豐後國。

sentences.english: This part is also the key point of this article. It is divides into three aspects.
sentences.chinese: 該部分也是本文的重點所在，分爲三個方面。

sentences.english: That was the beauty of it.
sentences.chinese: 這就是流浪的美之所在。

sentences.english: Is in the profession or other similar organization's average human resource flow level.
sentences.chinese: 就是所在行業或其他同類組織的平均人才流動水平。

sentences.english: There is a great potential of developing the agriculture relying on the Yellow River by exploiting the resource of land in Yinbei, Ningxia.
sentences.chinese: 開發銀北土地資源，是寧夏發展黃河農業的潛力所在。

sentences.english: Such as Chen Xinzhong organization are "non-cotton products" of the new school.
sentences.chinese: 比如陳新忠所在公司就屬於“非棉製品”的新一派。

sentences.english: The area along the Changjiang River region in Anhui was the essence of economic and social.
sentences.chinese: 皖江地區是安徽省經濟社會發展的精華所在。

sentences.english: I try to make sense of my universe.
sentences.chinese: 我試着尋找我的宇宙的意義所在。

sentences.english: I feel intimately inside myself where the role belongs.
sentences.chinese: 我能絲絲入扣地在自我當中感受角色之所在。

definition: to be in/to lie in/to consist in/to depend on/to rest with
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
variant of 是[shi4]/(used in given names)
(emphasizes that sth is precisely or exactly as stated)/precisely/exactly/even/if/just like/in the same way as
and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)
(emphasizes that sth is precisely or exactly as stated)/precisely/exactly/even/if/just like/in the same way as
to belong to/to be affiliated to/to fall under the jurisdiction of/a place where one feels that one belongs/one's final destination (where one need look no further)
